title: Mobile Microlearning Course Utilizing Interactive H5P Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in social studies and understanding of foundational theories related to job responsibilities
context.additional_context: Flexible mobile learning facilitated by BYOD (Bring Your Own Device), with summative assessments measuring outcomes. Learners possess advanced domain expertise as professionals in medical, legal, or technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts in social studies with over 80% accuracy using H5P interactive resources.
Learners complete at least 90% of their weekly learning targets (15 minutes/day × 5 days) in a mobile environment.
Learners rate their satisfaction with interactive learning methods at 4 points or higher (on a 5-point scale) via post-H5P activity surveys.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
